trans-unit.source: Configures the ASP.NET custom errors.
trans-unit.target: 配置 ASP.NET 自定义错误。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection> class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `customErrors` section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection> 类提供一种以编程方式访问和修改配置文件的 `customErrors` 节的方法。

trans-unit.source: This type is part of a group that includes the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorCollection>, <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsMode>, and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomError> types.
trans-unit.target: 此类型是包括的组的一部分<xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorCollection>， <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsMode>，和<xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomError>类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection> can read and write information from and to the related section of the configuration file according to the section property <xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A> whose value is <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition.Everywhere>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection>可以读取和写入信息 from 和 to 按照的部分属性的配置文件的相关节<xref:System.Configuration.SectionInformation.AllowDefinition%2A>其值是<xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationAllowDefinition.Everywhere>。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the section, which can also be accessed as members of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection> class.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何以声明方式为部分中，还可作为成员的访问的几个特性指定值<xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection>类。

trans-unit.source: The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `customErrors` section.
trans-unit.target: 下面的配置文件示例演示如何以声明方式为指定值`customErrors`部分。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection> 类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection" /> class using default settings.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认设置初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.%23ctor%2A> constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.%23ctor%2A>构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用的。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取实例<xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection>类通过<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether ASP.NET should display a generic error message when the custom error page cannot be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指示 ASP.NET 是否应在自定义错误页无法显示时显示泛型错误消息的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a generic error message should be displayed when the custom error page cannot be displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果自定义页面无法显示时应显示常见错误信息，则 <see langword="true" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default URL for redirection.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置重定向的默认 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default URL to which the application is redirected when an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序在发生错误时重定向到的默认 URL。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.DefaultRedirect%2A> is not specified, a standard error is displayed instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.DefaultRedirect%2A>未指定，则改为显示标准错误。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.DefaultRedirect%2A> specifies the generic error page to activate in case no error custom page exists.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.DefaultRedirect%2A>指定要在没有自定义错误页存在的情况下激活的一般性错误页。

trans-unit.source: The URL might be an absolute or a relative value.
trans-unit.target: URL 可以是绝对或相对的值。

trans-unit.source: A relative URL is relative to the Web.config file that specified the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.DefaultRedirect%2A>, not to the Web page in which the error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 相对 URL 是相对于指定的 Web.config 文件<xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.DefaultRedirect%2A>，而不发生错误的网页。

trans-unit.source: A relative URL starting with a tilde (~) is relative to the root path of the application.
trans-unit.target: 相对波形符 （~） 开头的 URL 是应用程序的根路径相对。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.DefaultRedirect%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.DefaultRedirect%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Refer to the code example in the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection> class topic to learn how to get the section.
trans-unit.target: 中的代码示例是指<xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection>类主题，若要了解如何获取此节。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.DefaultRedirect" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.DefaultRedirect" /> 属性为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This is the default.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.CustomError" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.CustomError" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorCollection" /> that contains the custom errors.
trans-unit.target: 包含自定义错误的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Each error is associated with a custom error condition and specifies a custom error page.
trans-unit.target: 每个错误关联的自定义错误条件，并指定自定义错误页。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.Errors%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.Errors%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error display modality.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置错误显示模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsMode" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsMode.RemoteOnly" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsMode.RemoteOnly" />。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether custom errors are enabled, disabled, or shown only to remote clients.
trans-unit.target: 指定自定义错误是启用、 禁用，或仅显示给远程客户端。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.Mode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.Mode%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Refer to the code example in the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection> class topic to learn how to get the section.
trans-unit.target: 中的代码示例是指<xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection>类主题，若要了解如何获取此节。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the URL of the request should be changed when the user is redirected to a custom error page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在将用户重定向到自定义错误页面时，是否应更改请求的 URL。

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the URL is changed when the user is redirected to the custom error page.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，指示将用户重定向到自定义错误页面后是否更改 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsRedirectMode.ResponseRedirect" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsRedirectMode.ResponseRedirect" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.RedirectMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsRedirectMode.ResponseRedirect>, the user is redirected to the error page and the original URL is changed to the URL of the error page.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.RedirectMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsRedirectMode.ResponseRedirect>、 用户重定向到错误页和原始 URL 更改为错误页的 URL。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.RedirectMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsRedirectMode.ResponseRewrite>, the user is sent to error page and the original URL in the browser is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsSection.RedirectMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.Configuration.CustomErrorsRedirectMode.ResponseRewrite>，用户发送到错误页，并在浏览器中的原始 URL 不会更改。
